text: The directors issuing separate letters in response to a statement made in Parliament on 23rd August said that the two hospitals are capable of providing all medicines prescribed by doctors for out and in house patients.The Directors of Tangalle and Monaragala Hospitals assured that there is no shortage of drugs in their hospitals.  The directors issuing separate letters in response to a statement made in Parliament on 23rd August said that the two hospitals are capable of providing all medicines prescribed by doctors for out and in house patients.
title: No drug shortage in Tangalle, Monaragala hospitals
